BASIC.BASIC_USAGE.DESC: Basic configuration of the map. In this example is shown how to define the map component, setting the center and zoom levels.
BASIC.BASIC_LAYERS.DESC: It can be configured which layer or layers will be the base layers of the map. By default, if none is provided it is used 'OpenStreetMap' base layer.
BASIC.BASIC_LAYERS.NOTE: The different base layer/s are taken from the extension 'leaflet-providers' that contains configurations for various free tile providers. Please, for production environments take into account what leaflet-providers developers says:
LAYERS.MARKER.BASIC_USAGE.DESC: It is possible to add markers to our map in the map definition itself.
